Description: Generates an endpoints file (with CRUD API endpoints) given a model and optional DbContext.

Arguments.Name: -e|--endpoints
Arguments.Description: Endpoints class to use. (not file name)

Arguments.Name: -outDir|--relativeFolderPath
Arguments.Description: Specify the relative output folder path from project where the file needs to be generated, if not specified, file will be generated in the project folder

Arguments.Name: -o|--open
Arguments.Description: Use this option to enable OpenAPI

Arguments.Name: -namespace|--endpointsNamespace
Arguments.Description: Specify the name of the namespace to use for the generated Endpoints file
